Plot: A documentary that follows an Alaskan bear family as its young cubs are taught life's most important lessons.
Title: Bears
Writer: Alastair Fothergill, Adam Chapman, Pamela Ribon (narration consultant)
tomatoConsensus: Sweet, beautifully filmed, and admirably short on sugarcoating, Bears continues Disneynature's winning streak.
Director: Alastair Fothergill, Keith Scholey, Adam Chapman
